name: onai-platform
description: Complete ONAI platform - Built with Manus AI - Notes app, Marketing website, Payment system, and Email templates

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:notes" "npm run dev:marketing" "npm run dev:payment"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:notes && npm run build:marketing && npm run build:payment
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/notes-app && npm install && cd ../marketing-website && npm install && cd ../payment-system && npm install
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:notes && npm run deploy:marketing && npm run deploy:payment
scripts.deploy:notes: cd apps/notes-app && npm run build && echo 'Notes app built - ready for deployment'
scripts.deploy:marketing: cd apps/marketing-website && npm run build && echo 'Marketing website built - ready for deployment'
scripts.deploy:payment: cd apps/payment-system && npm run build && echo 'Payment system built - ready for deployment'
scripts.lint:all: cd apps/notes-app && npm run lint && cd ../marketing-website && npm run lint && cd ../payment-system && npm run lint

author: ONAI Team (Built with Manus AI)
